dialogue: Ah, excellent. Nothing like a cup of hot joe to wake one up in the morning! Well, except an enthusiastic intern.
I watch with anticipation as he takes a sip.
Hmmf! Well, that's okay. For your first attempt. But before you leave today, I'd like a mug of coffee WITH milk.
I'll see what I can do, sir.
Good lad! But this one is perfect for me to...for me to...ah, that's the spot!
I watch as the boss enthusiastically finishes inside Emma, sipping his coffee all the while.
This is the weirdest job I've ever had.
